socialMedia.sql:
select u.user_id, u.user_full_name, u.user_mobile_phone_number, bw.branch_wilayah_name 
from user_schema.user u 
         inner join user_schema.agent a 
                    on u.user_id = a.user_id 
         inner join user_schema.universe_agent ua 
                    on a.agent_id = ua.agent_id 
                        and ua.agent_type = 'EXTERNAL' 
                        and ua.isactive = true 
         join user_schema.branch b on ua.branch_id = b.branch_id 
         join user_schema.branches_region br on br.branch_id = b.branch_id 
         join user_schema.branch_region brr on brr.branch_region_id = br.branch_region_id 
    and brr.isreferred_by_mantis 
         join user_schema.branch_region_wilayah brw on brw.branch_region_id = brr.branch_region_id 
         join user_schema.branch_wilayah bw on bw.branch_wilayah_id = brw.branch_wilayah_id 
    and bw.branch_wilayah_name in ('JAWA 1') 
where true group by u.user_id, u.user_full_name, bw.branch_wilayah_name 
order by u.user_full_name

select u.user_id, u.user_full_name, u.user_mobile_phone_number, bw.branch_wilayah_name 
from user_schema.user u 
         inner join user_schema.agent a 
                    on u.user_id = a.user_id 
         inner join user_schema.universe_agent ua 
                    on a.agent_id = ua.agent_id 
                        and ua.agent_type = 'EXTERNAL' 
                        and ua.isactive = true 
         join user_schema.branch b on ua.branch_id = b.branch_id 
         join user_schema.branches_region br on br.branch_id = b.branch_id 
         join user_schema.branch_region brr on brr.branch_region_id = br.branch_region_id 
    and brr.isreferred_by_mantis 
         join user_schema.branch_region_wilayah brw on brw.branch_region_id = brr.branch_region_id 
         join user_schema.branch_wilayah bw on bw.branch_wilayah_id = brw.branch_wilayah_id 
    and bw.branch_wilayah_name in ('JAWA 1') 
where true group by u.user_id, u.user_full_name, bw.branch_wilayah_name 
order by u.user_full_name

from user_schema.user u 
         inner join user_schema.agent a 
                    on u.user_id = a.user_id 
         inner join user_schema.universe_agent ua 
                    on a.agent_id = ua.agent_id
